downloadDescription: Plato is a C++ open-source neural network library which supports the specification of a large range of graph types, several activation functions and training losses. Last published: June 1, 2015.
detailsSection: Plato is a C++ open-source neural network library which supports the specification of a large range of graph types, several activation functions and training losses. The library supports backpropagation and truncated BPTT, especially useful for Recurrent Neural Networks. It supports SGD, minibatched SGD and we also implemented several second-order like optimizers such as Adagrad and AdaDelta. It runs on CUDA 6.
